title: Arafura to Alice
creator_credit: Film Australia, Peter Johnson and Nick Torrens
brief_description: A film showing life in Darwin, Tennant Creek, Alice Springs, and Ayers Rock in the early 1980’s. This demanding, tough and often inhospitable part of Australia is inhabited by a special type of Australian and is opening up to anyone who is prepared to accept the challenge that the Northern Territory offers.
